name: Publicly Accessible RDS Instance
query: {   dbInstances(     where: {       cloudProvider: "aws"       publiclyAccessible: true       securityGroups_SOME: {         rules_SOME: {           direction: "Inbound"           OR: [             { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:0.0.0.0/0" }             { sources_INCLUDES: "cidr:::/0" }           ]         }       }     }   ) {     identifier     accountID     cloudAccountID     cloudAccountName     cloudProvider     idFromProvider     internalAssetType     internalName     internalRegion     assetCategory   } }
